patthana16.8:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in SN 4.)
patthana16.8:0.3_0: These are the marks of a bungalow, plastered inside and out.
patthana16.8:1.1_0: Not declared the teaching that has no undeclared; no support, the training, and nourishes to listen.
patthana16.8:1.1_1: Unsullied, not skilled in profitable teaching. ...
patthana16.8:1.1_2: (These six discourses should be expanded in line with the previous set.)
patthana16.8:2.1_0: Unskillfulness doesnâ€™t give rise to the teaching of the skillful.
